programme.title: Dora the Explorer S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Dora in Wonderland - In an update on Alice in Wonderland, Dora and Boots enter a looking glass world filled with fantastic creatures and exciting places so they can save their kitties who are headed to the tea party with the cranky Queen of Hearts.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Song Time with Blue - It's a music filled day at the Blue's Clues house as we try to figure out what song Blue wants to sing. On the way, we help Josh & Blue identify sounds of musical instruments and help chicks from the farm with their song show.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure of Clue Lagoon - Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blue's Big City Adventure S01 Ep1
programme.desc: Blue's Big City Adventure - When Josh gets the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for Rainbow Puppy's Broadway musical, Josh and Blue skidoo to New York City where they discover the magic of music and dance and following your dreams!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing “Cuckoo!”, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a day’s cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa’s friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Rocket Ski Rescue - Crusher’s Grammy is in town to watch Crusher and Blaze race at the Monster Dome. But when Crusher tries to cheat using rocket skis, his plan backfires, blasting him off the racetrack and across Axle City!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey - A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Melting and Freezing - Pup is at the beach and Kit is in the snow. Can you see who has the melting ice cream and who has the frozen lolly? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator discover which food will melt and which will stay the same.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Digger - Dee encourages a friend to say 'digger' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of diggers - a big digger, a small digger, a dumping digger and a really muddy digger!

programme.desc: Lullaby - During Tiddlytubbies' Sleepybyes, RuRu is wide awake. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take it in turns to sing him a lullaby.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: Catch a Falling Star - Nothing is going right for any of the Clangers today, until a strange star passes by.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: The Thing That Broke - The Dinopaws invent the best game ever - bigging and rounding.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: The Amazing Fence - The Blockers are building a fence, but they accidentally create a maze. With one Blocker lost inside, can Team Tinpo help him find a way out?

programme.desc: Hiders N' Seekers - In this episode, a small addition brings big excitement to a game of Hide N' Seek!

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Ginger Beef Steak/ Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes!

programme.title: Rising
programme.desc: Top European brands love Japanese textiles but its workshops are dying. Miyaura Shinya connects artisans and designers and has set up a course to train newcomers. Can he slow the industry's decline?

programme.title: Rockie And Her Friends

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: "The Siege of Osaka" folding screen contains graphic images of suffering not found in similar works of its era. Professor Frederik Cryns uncovers the secrets of who painted it, and why.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts

A swarming wrestler who has stopped Chris Daukaus and Tom Aspinall in back to back fights, Blaydes is in prime form entering his spring showdown with Russia’s Pavlovich, who has won five in a row, all by knockout, over the likes of Derrick Lewis and Tai Tuivasa
